products.name: Microsoft - Surface Pro 7+ - 12.3” Touch Screen – Intel Core i3 – 8GB Memory – 128GB SSD with Black Type Cover (Latest Model) - Platinum
products.albumTitle: Surface Pro 7+ - 12.3” Touch Screen – Intel Core i3 – 8GB Memory – 128GB SSD with Black Type Cover (Latest Model)
products.longDescription: Classic Surface Pro 2-in-1 design meets high-speed performance, giving you premium laptop power, a powerful tablet, or portable digital canvas designed to light up the best of Windows 11. You’re in control, with the fast, reliable 11th Gen Intel Core performance you need, front and rear-facing HD cameras and Studio Mics for crystal-clear video calls, and compatibility across generations of accessories, Type Covers, and more with both USB-C and USB-A ports, plus a MicroSD slot. Adjust the Kickstand, add a Type Cover,* and do more of what you love — all at our best value for a Surface Pro powered by Intel.

products.name: Apple - Geek Squad Certified Refurbished 12.9-Inch iPad Pro (3rd generation) with Wi-Fi - 512GB - Space Gray
products.albumTitle: Geek Squad Certified Refurbished 12.9-Inch iPad Pro (3rd generation) with Wi-Fi - 512GB
products.longDescription: Geek Squad® Certified Refurbished products are thoroughly, painstakingly and lovingly tested, so you can be sure that your device will work right, right away. Geek Squad® Certified Refurbished products.The new 12.9" iPad Pro features an advanced Liquid Retina display that goes edge to edge.¹ Face ID, so you can securely unlock iPad Pro, log in to apps, and pay with just a glance. The A12X Bionic chip is faster than many PC laptops and easily runs pro apps. All-day battery life.³ Wi-Fi. Over a million apps available on the App Store, including augmented reality experiences. And the new Apple Pencil and Smart Keyboard Folio help you be even more creative and productive.² It will make you rethink what iPad is capable of - and what a computer is capable of.

Geek Squad® Certified Refurbished products.The 12.9-inch iPad Pro features an immersive, edge-to-edge Liquid Retina display.¹ The new pro cameras, Wide and new Ultra Wide, combined with the all-new LiDAR Scanner enable entirely new experiences in the next generation of augmented reality (AR) apps. A12Z Bionic chip for powering essential apps and graphics-intensive games. Support for the new Magic Keyboard with trackpad² and Apple Pencil.² All-day battery life.³ And access to millions of apps on the App Store to transform iPad Pro into anything you need, anywhere you need it.

products.longDescription: Geek Squad® Certified Refurbished products are thoroughly, painstakingly and lovingly tested, so you can be sure that your device will work right, right away. Geek Squad® Certified Refurbished products.The new iPad. It's your digital notebook, mobile office, photo studio, game console, and personal cinema. With the A12 Bionic chip that can easily power essential apps and immersive games. So you can edit a document while researching on the web and making a FaceTime call to a colleague at the same time. Apple Pencil makes note-taking with iPad a breeze.¹ Attach a full-size Smart Keyboard for comfortable typing.¹ And go further with Wi-Fi and Gigabit-class LTE² and all-day battery life.³

products.name: Microsoft - Surface Go 3 – 10.5” Touch-Screen – Intel Core i3 – 8GB Memory -128GB SSD - WiFi + LTE - Device Only (Latest Model) - Platinum
products.albumTitle: Surface Go 3 – 10.5” Touch-Screen – Intel Core i3 – 8GB Memory -128GB SSD - WiFi + LTE - Device Only (Latest Model)
products.longDescription: The most portable Surface touchscreen 2-in-1 is perfect for your everyday tasks, homework, and play. Designed to light up the best of Windows 11, Surface Go 3 is optimized for digital pen and touch, with a choice of a faster Intel Pentium or Intel Core i3 processor, plus all-day battery⁹, tablet-to-laptop versatility, and comprehensive Microsoft security.

products.longDescription: The Lenovo Tab M8 LTE is an impressive tablet. Sleek metal construction, a spectacular HD display, and a Dolby Audio-tuned speaker come together to bring you enjoyable entertainment with luxury appeal. With a quad-core processor and up to 12 hours of battery life.

products.longDescription: Bring your operations to the next level with the Lenovo Tab K10 tablet. It's enterprise-ready and highly customizable to the needs of your business, with a battery that lasts all day, as well as a battery-less option for stationary and always-on displays. Enjoy a spacious and clear workspace on its spacious 10.3" FHD touchscreen as well.

products.name: Nokia - T20 64GB Wi-Fi Android Tablet - Ocean Blue
products.albumTitle: T20 64GB Wi-Fi Android Tablet
products.longDescription: Designed, built and tested with the same passion as all Nokia products, T20 brings that trusted quality to the big screen, so you have one less thing to worry about – even if your day gets a bit bumpier. Nowadays, long battery life is a necessity. Nokia T20 comes with enough power to see you through up to 7 hours of online meetings, 10 hours of movies or 15 hours of surfing the web¹. Plus, faster charging means you can get back to what you were doing even quicker. From conference calls to science class, the power is yours. Nokia T20 makes light work of your day-to-day (and night) viewing with a captivating 2K screen. Whether you’re getting through 14 hours on a train, viewing a work presentation on the go, or just relaxing at home with a movie, the details are going to pop off your screen. It's also low blue light certified, so it’s easier on the eyes. Stay up to date with 2 years of OS upgrades and keep the whole family’s safe and sound with 3 years of timely security updates. It’s all locked safely behind the easy-to-use face unlock feature. Whether you’re playing games or multi-tasking across a few apps, you need a device that keeps up. Thankfully, Nokia T20 is boasts power to spare, with an octa-core chip ensuring a faster, more reliable user experience, even when pushed to the max. In short, there’s some serious power under this hood. You need to be able to catch every word of every meeting, and when the day is done, enjoy your favorite entertainment with the stunning sound it deserves. Stereo speakers with OZO Playback deliver truly immersive listening experience - wherever you are.

products.name: HP - 11" Tablet - Intel Pentium - 4GB Memory - 128GB SSD - Natural Silver
products.albumTitle: 11" Tablet - Intel Pentium - 4GB Memory - 128GB SSD
products.longDescription: Create wherever inspiration strikes: Collaborate in new ways and show off your work with an adjusting highres 13 mega pixel camera. Focus on what your saying and not your looks with camera enhancements with Auto Frame from HP GlamCam. More than a tablet PC: Sleek and stylish twill fabric finished magnetic cover. Do it your way with a kickstand that works in both portrait and landscape modes. Featuring a 3.2 aspect ratio allowing you to see more of your content with less scrolling.  Connect with everything: The perfect companion to all your devices. Wirelessly connect to a second display with Duet® for HP. Plus wirelessly transfer photos, videos, documents and more between your PC and mobile device with HP QuickDrop.  Made with purpose: The HP 11 inch Tablet PC is ENERGY STAR® certified and EPEAT® Silver registered. And because little things make a big difference, we've included sustainable materials like ocean-bound plastic and post-consumer recycled plastic in the design.

products.name: HP - 11" Tablet - Intel Pentium - 4GB Memory - 128GB SSD with keyboard - Natural Silver
products.albumTitle: 11" Tablet - Intel Pentium - 4GB Memory - 128GB SSD with keyboard
products.longDescription: Create wherever inspiration strikes: Draw, take notes and ideate from anywhere with HP Palette. Flip into laptop mode and conquer tasks with the detachable magnetic keyboard. Collaborate from any angle with a 13MP rotatable camera with HP GlamCam.  More than a tablet PC: Seamlessly connect to your devices to create, work and play in new ways. Use as a second display or input device with Duet® for HP and built in kickstand. Pop on the magnetic keyboard in either horizontal or Vertical orientation. Show off your workspace with the auto adjusting camera.  Connect with everything: The perfect companion to all your devices. Wirelessly connect to a second display with Duet® for HP. Plus wirelessly transfer photos, videos, documents and more between your PC and mobile device with HP QuickDrop.  Made with purpose: The HP 11 inch Tablet PC is ENERGY STAR® certified and EPEAT® Silver registered. And because little things make a big difference, we've included sustainable materials like ocean-bound plastic and post-consumer recycled plastic in the design.

products.longDescription: Geek Squad® Certified Refurbished products are thoroughly, painstakingly and lovingly tested, so you can be sure that your device will work right, right away. Geek Squad® Certified Refurbished products.Browse the Internet and stay productive with this Samsung Galaxy Tab S6 Lite tablet. The Exynos processor and 4GB of RAM deliver fast performance for running multiple applications, while the rechargeable 7040 mAh battery offers hours of uptime on a single charge. This oxford gray Samsung Galaxy Tab S6 Lite tablet features a slim metal design to minimize bulk.

products.name: Microsoft - Surface Pro 8 – 13” Touch Screen – Intel Evo Platform Core i5 – 8GB Memory – 256GB SSD – Device with Black Keyboard - Graphite
products.albumTitle: Surface Pro 8 – 13” Touch Screen – Intel Evo Platform Core i5 – 8GB Memory – 256GB SSD – Device with Black Keyboard
products.longDescription: Unlock more possibilities than ever with the Pro designed for a Pro like you. The first consumer laptop-to-tablet PC designed on the Intel Evo platform⁹ and designed to light up the best of Windows 11, Surface Pro 8 combines the power of a laptop with the flexibility of a tablet, and every angle in between, with the iconic Kickstand and detachable Keyboard.* Do great things with a larger 13” touchscreen, faster connections with Thunderbolt 4 ports, and extra speed when you need it.

products.name: Microsoft - Surface Laptop Go - 12.4" Touch-Screen - Intel 10th Generation Core i5 - 4GB Memory - 64GB eMMC - Platinum
products.albumTitle: Surface Laptop Go - 12.4" Touch-Screen - Intel 10th Generation Core i5 - 4GB Memory - 64GB eMMC
products.longDescription: Make the most of every day with the sleek style, performance, and all-day battery life² you need in the lightest Surface Laptop, all at an exceptional value. Ultra-light and portable profile, the apps* you use every day, premium materials, and a choice of must-have colors will make this your go-to laptop.     ²Up to 13 hours of battery life based on typical Surface device usage. Testing conducted by Microsoft in September 2020 using preproduction software and preproduction configurations of Surface Laptop Go Testing consisted of full battery discharge with a mixture of active use and modern standby. The active use portion consists of (1) a web browsing test accessing 8 popular websites over multiple open tabs, (2) a productivity test utilizing Microsoft Word, PowerPoint, Excel and Outlook, and (3) a portion of time with the device in use with idle applications. All settings were default except screen brightness was set to 150nits with Auto-Brightness disabled. Wi-Fi was connected to a network. Battery life varies significantly with settings, usage and other factors.

products.name: Microsoft - Surface Laptop Go 2 - 12.4” Touch-Screen – Intel Core i5 – 8GB Memory - 256GB SSD (Latest Model) - Platinum
products.albumTitle: Surface Laptop Go 2 - 12.4” Touch-Screen – Intel Core i5 – 8GB Memory - 256GB SSD (Latest Model)
products.longDescription: A sleek, portable Surface Laptop with 12.4" PixelSense touchscreen¹ and great typing experience with precision trackpad, plus the ports you need. Now with an improved HD camera to look your best on video calls, new Windows 11 experiences,² long battery life,³ and a performance boost for the things you love to do. With 11th Gen Intel speed for day-to-day apps, streaming, and casual gaming. It’s signature Surface style, speed, and convenient security for you and everyone in your home.

products.name: BLU - M8L 2022 32GB 8" Tablet (Unlocked) - Black
products.albumTitle: M8L 2022 32GB 8" Tablet (Unlocked)
products.longDescription: Gorgeous tablet with a stunning pattern battery cover that is sure to impress the crowd. Matched with a sexy jet-black curved glass display that is the epitome of elegance. Premium curved glass that encase the vivid 8” high definition display. Super strong and smooth user experience that makes the M8L 2022 one of the best tablets on the market. Rocking the latest power efficient 2.0GHz Quad-Core processor, the M8L 2022 breezes through tasks effortlessly. Surf the internet, movie time or work, nothing stops the flow. Capture all of your favorite memories with a 8 Megapixel main camera and 5 Megapixel selfie. Live life to the fullest. Never have to run low on battery, the M8L 2022 is equipped with a powerful 4,000mAh batter for all day use.

products.name: BLU - M8L 32GB 8" Tablet (Unlocked) - Black
products.albumTitle: M8L 32GB 8" Tablet (Unlocked)
products.longDescription: Gorgeous pattern grace the back cover on the all new M8L tablet that stands out among competitors. High definition 8” display that brings all the realistic images to life. Saturated colors and super bright, you will experience the best movie on the M8L. Breeze through all your apps with octa-core speed with 1.6GHz computing power, flawless performance for all your daily task. All your favorite moments locked away to be relived. The M8L comes with 8 Megapixel main camera and a 5 Megapixel selfie that ensure you are ready to capture those moments. The M8L is packed with a 4,000mAh long lasting battery and comes with a Type C Charger. Blazing speed OS that allows apps to start up 15% faster when you run Android (Go edition).

products.name: Hyundai - HYtab Plus 10WB2 10.1" - 32GB - WiFi - Space Gray
products.albumTitle: HYtab Plus 10WB2 10.1" - 32GB - WiFi
products.longDescription: The HYtab Plus 10WB2 is designed for an improved entertainment experience, delivering a better tablet with high-speed network connections to browse, video chat, play games, watch movies and more. This 10.1" WiFi Android tablet is powered by a strong Quad-Core processor with 3GB of RAM and 32GB of storage that can be expanded with its microSD slot which supports up to an additional 128GB. Get blazing-fast speeds with its powerful and reliable WiFi connection. The Hyundai HYtab Plus 10WB2 uses the latest Android 11 operating system, making it smarter, faster and adapts to you the more you use it.

products.name: Hyundai - HYtab Pro 8LA1 8" - 64FB - WiFi+LTE - Black
products.albumTitle: HYtab Pro 8LA1 8" - 64FB - WiFi+LTE
products.longDescription: The HYtab Pro 8LA1's ultra sleek slim design slips right into your bag and comes with a vivid, crystal clear FHD display. Its Octa-Core processor comes fully equipped with 4GB of RAM and 64GB of storage, efficiently improving the running speed of all your daily needs - working, studying and entertainment. With the latest Android 11 operating system, it harnesses the power of artificial intelligence to give you a more robust and experience. Built for web-first experiences, the included SIM card slot allows you to always stay connected, combining blazing fast LTE and WiFi connections. Need more memory? The built in microSD card slot can support an additional 128GB of memory. The 8LA1 tablet is a powerful, slim device designed to keep up with you throughout your busy day.
